fields.subject: UCN Request
Thank you for feedback
fields.body:
We have received your {type}.
 Our team will get back to you soon.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id} Details
fields.body:
Your {type} has been assigned to one of our technician.
 Severity:{priority}.
 Once it resolved we will notify you.

fields.subject: Feedback with reference-no-{id} Assign To You
fields.body:
A GladMinds user has a {type} for us, which says:
 {message} 
 Its has been reported by {reporter} on {created_date}.
 It has been assigned to you.
 Please address the issue as soon as possible.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id}
Feedback  with reference-no-{id} resolved
Feedback  with reference-no-{id} resolved
fields.body: The {type} reported by {reporter} on {created_date} has been resolved.
